recent.title: Alfred Waiter
recent.description: University project that consists of a simple mobile app to order food from your restaurant table. Stop waiting for the waiter to arrive!

recent.title: Electronic Bill to Excel
recent.description: Simple utility to convert a group of Costa Rican electronic bills to an Excel file. This will probably be replaced for a more featured app later.

opensource.title: pgcv
opensource.description: PostgreSQL extension for Computer Vision from the database server. The extension implements algorithms for image segmentation, in particular: digital mammogram segmentation.

opensource.title: Giraffe Viewer
opensource.description: GUI for the Medical Imaging database propossed by the pgcv PostgreSQL extension

websites.title: Agatok
websites.description: Simple landing page for a precision agriculture product. Right now, the page is just a way to subscribe to a mailing list about the product development

old.title: Remus
old.description: Educational Android App to help students improve their music reading ability.

old.title: Oracle Backup Executor
old.description: Windows service that manages and fulfills backups made to Oracle database instances according to their backup strategy (University project).

old.title: Oracle Strategy Manager
old.description: Windows application to create backup strategies for multiple remote Oracle instances (University project)

old.title: Oracle Security Monitor
old.description: Windows application to check the roles anf privileges of users in an Oracle database, as well as other security policies (University project).

old.title: Oracle Tablespace Monitor
old.description: Windows application to monitor an Oracle database tablespace usage (University project)

old.title: Oracle Memory Monitor
old.description: Windows application to monitor an Oracle database memory usage (University project)
